info.title: Master Inspection Characteristic - Read
info.description: A master inspection characteristic is a master data record that describes the quality inspection criteria for materials. This service enables you to retrieve, for example, the settings and the control indicators defined for a master inspection characteristic.

x-sap-shortText: Read quality inspection specifications of the type master inspection characteristic using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Quality Management in Discrete Manufacturing(1E1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1E1 " Link To BP ")
[Quality Management in Stock Handling(1MR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MR " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Quality Management: Master Inspection Characteristic (QM_INSPECTIONSPECIFICATION)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads a set of master inspection characteristics.
get.description: Reads a set of master inspection characteristics with administrative data, control indicators, catalog data, and quantitative data.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: InspectionSpecificationVersion
parameters.description: Version Number of Master Inspection Characteristic

get.summary: Reads a specific master inspection characteristic.
get.description: Reads a specific master inspection characteristic with administrative data, control indicators, catalog data, and quantitative data.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: InspectionSpecificationVersion
parameters.description: Version Number of Master Inspection Characteristic

get.summary: Reads master inspection characteristics with text associations.
get.description: Reads one or more master inspection characteristics with associations to the related master inspection characteristic texts.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads all master inspection characteristic texts.
get.description: Reads all master inspection characteristic texts.

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

get.summary: Reads the text of a master inspection characteristic in a specific language.
get.description: Reads the short text of a specific master inspection characteristic in a specific language.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads master inspection characteristic texts with associations to master inspection characteristics.
get.description: Reads one or more master inspection characteristic texts with associations to the related master inspection characteristics.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_InspectionSpecification HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
